definitions.definition: A pitted , now usually metal , cup-shaped cap worn on the tip of a finger , which is used in sewing to push the needle through material .
As much as fills a thimble (sense 1) ; a thimbleful .
An object which resembles a thimble (sense 1) in shape or size .

subdefinitions.definition: A thimble or similar object used in thimblerig ( “ a game of skill which requires the bettor to guess under which of three thimbles or small cups a pea-sized object has been placed after the person operating the game rapidly rearranges them ” ) .
A socket in machinery shaped like a thimble.

definitions.definition: A metal ring which a cable or rope intended for attaching to other things is looped around as a protection against chafing .
A ring - or tube - shaped component such as a ferrule .

main_definition: ( sewing ) A pitted , now usually metal , cup-shaped cap worn on the tip of a finger , which is used in sewing to push the needle through material .
secondary_definitions: As much as fills a thimble (sense 1) ; a thimbleful .
( also attributively ) An object which resembles a thimble (sense 1) in shape or size .
( nautical ) A metal ring which a cable or rope intended for attaching to other things is looped around as a protection against chafing .
( technology ) A ring - or tube - shaped component such as a ferrule .
